sub_title: Hubmanager Innovatiehub Winterswijk-Aalten | Projectmedewerker Grenzhoppers | Achterban | JCI Hamaland | Euregio Youth
summary:
Dear Network,

From August 2023, after being active as Hub Manager of Innovation Hub Winterswijk for three years, I will start as Business Developer at Colubris Cleantech!

For three years, I was allowed to supervise around 100 students at Colubris Cleantech, Contour Covering Technology BV, Klein Poelhuis Bedrijven and Apparatenfabriek ARA B.V.. During this learning period, I supervised students on assignments such as implementing a cobot, creating a digital factory, improving project data storage and improving pilot units in the chemical engineering field. It was quite a challenge.

In recent years, the companies have established super-collaborations with the various ROCs, universities and HBOs in the region: Saxion University of Applied Sciences, Wageningen University & Research, Westfälische Hochschule , Arnhem and Nijmegen University of Applied Sciences, Graafschap College, University of Twente. Many thanks for this to all cooperation partners! Bonne Jansen will take over this contact from mid-August as my successor.

During these three years, I found out that the combination of language, technology and business administration really interests me. This comes together in Business Development.

Besides continuing in this new job at Colubris Cleantech from August, I am still active as an entrepreneur for the Grenzhoppers, Grenzhoppers Business School and the GROS regiodeal project.

... and, of course, I will also continue to study a bit of Spanish ;)

I am already looking forward to it!

treasury_media.title: Opening van het Grensland College in Winterswijk
treasury_media.description: Met het doorknippen van een lint heeft demissionair minister Ingrid van Engelshoven donderdagmiddag in Winterswijk het nieuwe Grensland College geopend. De school gaat grensoverschrijdend onderwijs aanbieden aan zowel Nederlandse als Duitse studenten...

treasury_media.description: WINTERSWIJK - Winterswijker Tycho Geurkink (20) is de enige Nederlandse student aan de Westfälische Hochschule in het Duitse Bocholt. "Ik zag het als een uitdaging om in Duitsland te studeren.''

treasury_media.title: Cursus Duits voor winkelpersoneel kan de omzet opstuwen van Achterhoekse bedrijven
treasury_media.description: WINTERSWIJK / DOETINCHEM - 'Kan ich Ihnen helfen? Wat kan ik voor u doen?, maar dan in het Duits. Het lijkt een eenvoudig zinnetje. Maar veel winkelpersoneel in Achterhoekse ondernemingen heeft inmiddels in de gaten dat zo'n zinnetje goud waard kan zijn.

profile_positions.description:
Colubris Cleantech started Innovation Hub Winterswijk-Aalten together with other companies. 

Colubris is a privately owned Dutch company with over 35 years'experience in separation and purifying technologies. We offer a complete range of products and processes for Water, Waste and Bioresource solutions. We design, manufacture and construct complete systems. From a simple screen to the integration of the most advanced technologies aimed to generate value from waste. From idea to turnkey realization. 

Within Colubris Cleantech, I counsel students in Chemical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Mechatronics, Technical Business Administration and Environmental Technology. The students researched processes and products. New units were designed and existing units redesigned. In addition, Applied Research supports Colubris' R&D team with their research. For instance, several studies have also been conducted on purifying water with new techniques. From lab tests to pilot tests. I supervised the students within Contour on a 'general' level. This involved checking reports, studying subjects in depth and keeping in touch with colleges and universities.

Besides supervising students, I built a full Academy for Colubris with a training programme. Through surveys and a lot of contact with colleagues, a training programme has been set up to bring all colleagues up to a good level in the Water Solutions, Waste Solutions and Bioresource Solutions divisions.
profile_positions.title: Colubris Cleantech, Academy Manager

profile_positions.description:
Since September 2020, I have had my own company also named "Tycho Geurkink". Within my own company, I help companies with their steps towards Germany. 

Within the GROS Regiodeal Project of the municipalities Winterswijk, Aalten, Oude IJsselstreek and Bocholt, I am responsible for the Grenzhoppers Business School. From the Grenzhoppers Business School, I organise courses, seminars and trainings to provide companies with all the information they need to do business in Germany.
profile_positions.title: Tycho Geurkink

profile_positions.description:
Grenzhoppers is an alliance of Dutch and German municipalities, companies and socio-cultural organisations. The network includes more than 600 participants by 2021. Grenzhoppers provides a regional platform for knowledge sharing and also facilitates the implementation of a variety of cross-border projects and activities. 

From the municipality of Winterswijk, I started small projects within the Project Grenzhoppers. These included projects from connecting local sports associations to facilitating Goethe Certificates German for secondary schools.

I am currently the chairman of the Grenzhoppers Foundation. From the Foundation we try to support as many cross-border activities as possible.
profile_positions.title: Grenzhoppers, Project Coördinator

profile_positions.description:
The Grenzhoppers Business School offers entrepreneurs in the German-Dutch border region courses, seminars and training with the aim of simplifying the step to Germany. 

The strategy of the Grenzhoppers Business School is increasingly focusing on becoming a total provider: we want to be able to tackle all questions of entrepreneurs regarding the German Market. We are creating a knowledge platform with articles, coupled with an e-learning containing knowledge about Marketing & Communication, Law & Tax Law, Logistics & Packaging, Personnel & Recruitment and starting a business in Germany. In addition to these topics, language will become an increasingly important part of the program.

I started working for this project from the Winterswijk municipality and am now doing this from my own company for the GROS Regiodeal project. Within the project I am responsible for achieving the subsidy targets. This includes organizing courses, trainings and seminars, finding companies and linking supply and demand within this market.
profile_positions.title: Grenzhoppers Business School, Programme Coördinator

profile_positions.description:
Since May 2019, I have been active for Winterswijk municipality and specifically within network Grenzhoppers. For Winterswijk municipality, cross-border cooperation is very important. The municipality is largely bordered by Germany and therefore cooperates a lot with its German neighbouring municipalities.

In 2016, the network Grenzhoppers was established by the municipalities of Aalten, Oost Gelre and Winterswijk on the Dutch side and Bocholt, Vreden, Südlohn, Rhede und Isselburg on the German side. The aim of the network was to connect cross-border initiatives, share knowledge and get to know each other. The network, which in 2016 consisted mainly of employees of municipalities, has grown into a bi-national meeting platform of entrepreneurs, employees from the culture and tourism sector and government institutions and now has more than 600 members. Grenzhoppers is now a foundation and the networking platform from which numerous cross-border initiatives arise and will celebrate its first anniversary in 2021.  

In 2019, I started as an intern under Public Relations. I dealt with Grenzhoppers and my own project, the Grenzhoppers Business School.

Achieved publications:
• https://www.gelderlander.nl/winterswijk/gratis-cursus-duits-voor-winkelpersoneel-in winterswijk~a7c52ebf/?referrer=https://www.google.com/ 
• https://winterswijk.org/gratis-cursus-duits/
• https://aha24x7.com/winkelpersoneel-in-winterswijk-krijgt-gratis-cursus-duits/ 
• https://www.achterhoeknieuwsborculoruurlo.nl/reader/26724/207379/korte-handzame-gratis-cursus-duits
• https://www.omroepgelderland.nl/nieuws/2419813/Gratis-cursus-Duits-voor-winkelpersoneel-in-Winterswijk

These days, I work at Grenzhoppers Business School from a RegioDeal project. For the municipality of Winterswijk, I have other assignments/projects on a monthly basis: keeping in touch with local schools regarding the language German and German-Dutch cooperation.
profile_positions.title: Municipality Winterswijk, Project Coördinator

profile_positions.description:
Klein Poelhuis Installatietechniek started Innovation Hub Winterswijk-Aalten together with other companies.

Klein Poelhuis is a modern provider of total solutions in installation technology. Our great strength lies in creating and realising innovative, energy-conscious concepts with optimal comfort. We do not limit ourselves to delivering professional work and reliable 24-hour service. We like to look further. Throughout the entire project, our expertise contributes to the final result.

Within Klein Poelhuis, I am responsible for the general supervision of all students from Innovation Hub Winterswijk. In the coming periods, these will be students in Installation Engineering, Business Administration, Marketing and Commercial Economics.
profile_positions.title: Klein Poelhuis Installatietechniek, Academy Manager

profile_positions.description:
An Innovation Hub is a non-profit partnership in which students from different study backgrounds enhance the innovation capacity of one to five (SME) companies through the implementation of research and innovation projects. Each hub has its own hub manager - funded by the hub's companies. He/she is responsible for recruiting, selecting and supervising students and continuing knowledge development.

Currently, there are six stand-alone Innovation Hubs in the province of Gelderland (epicentre is the Achterhoek and Liemers region). At those hubs, between 200 and 220 students per year find innovative (internship) assignments.

Since September 2020, I started working at Innovation Hub Winterswijk- Aalten.  This is a cooperation between Colubris Cleantech, Contour Covering Technology, ARA Apparatenfabriek and Klein Poelhuis Installatietechniek. At the time, this was still a new Innovation Hub. Within the various affiliated companies, it was my job to look for internship and graduation assignments, define them and eventually find students for them. 

As of February 2021, around 60 students with backgrounds in Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Embedded Systems, Chemical Engineering, Business Administration, Marketing and other backgrounds have been supervised. These students were supervised within Colubris Cleantech, Contour Covering Technology, ARA Apparatenfabriek and Klein Poelhuis Installatietechniek.
profile_positions.title: Innovatiehub Winterswijk, Hubmanager

profile_positions.description:
Contour Covering Technology started Innovation Hub Winterswijk-Aalten together with other companies. 

Contour Covering Technology BV is a supplier of sheet metal parts and assemblies. We distinguish ourselves by accurate, clean, and low-scratch work. With broadly deployable competencies we serve customers in a mix of market sectors.

Within Contour Covering Technology, I supervised students of Mechanical Engineering, Technical Business Administration, Mechatronics and Marketing. 

I supervised the students within Contour on a 'general' level. This involved checking reports, studying subjects in depth and keeping in touch with colleges and universities.

Projects: 'The implementation of Automated Guided Vehicles', 'The implementation of Collaborative Robots', a diverse range of Business Cases: 3D laserwelding, powdercoat installation, swivel bending. Furthermore, research was carried out on the construction of a degreasing machine. Business-to-consumer selling was also researched.
profile_positions.title: Contour Covering Technology, Academy Manager

profile_positions.description:
ARA Apparatenfabriek started Innovation Hub Winterswijk-Aalten together with other companies.

ARA builds mechatronic systems for Original Equipment Manufacturers. Here, ARA has everything in-house; all steps in the production process are carried out by its own expert employees. The organisation has the following engineering disciplines: embedded hardware and software for electronic products, electrical for control panels, mechanical for sheet metal constructions, frames and housings. The production department assembles printed circuit boards, complete technically high-quality mechatronic modules and sheet metal products, including (in-house) powder coating and wet painting.

For ARA, I supervised students with backgrounds in Mechanical Engineering, Mechatronics, Chemical Engineering, Engineering Management and Marketing. 

During the time I worked for ARA, a lot of marketing-related studies were done. Studies were also done on various mechatronic systems. A number of students were involved in Controlling and Power BI.
profile_positions.title: ARA Apparatenfabriek, Academy Manager

profile_positions.description: To increase my knowledge regarding German and especially helping German customers, I started working at Obelink Vrijetijdsmarkt in 2018. Obelink focuses on selling tents, caravans, camping equipment, accessories, garden furniture and is one of Europe's largest companies in this field. At Obelink, I worked in customer service. This involved helping customers in the shop and handling queries on the phone.
profile_positions.title: Obelink Vrijetijdsmarkt, Customer Service

volunteer_experiences.description: "JCI stands for Junior Chamber International and is a networking organisation for entrepreneurial people up to the age of 40 who wish to develop personally. Since 2020, I have joined JCI Hamaland, a cross-border chamber. We want to contribute to the border region by motivating young active citizens, the government and companies to work together."

"JCI stands for Junior Chamber International and is a networking organisation for entrepreneurial people up to the age of 40 who wish to develop personally. Since 2020, I have joined JCI Hamaland, a cross-border chamber. We want to contribute to the border region by motivating young active citizens, the government and companies to work together."

"As young people, we determine the future of the Achterhoek together. The Achterhoek is the region where we are happy, where we live, work and have a social life. That is why, as young people, we like to think together about the future of this region. We are a group of young people actively committed to the Achterhoek. We build a bridge between the young people who have ideas to make the Achterhoek more beautiful and the organisations and policymakers who can turn these ideas into action. 

We sit around the table with policymakers the moment decisions are made that affect young people in the region. Talk to entrepreneurs and organisations taking initiatives to make the Achterhoek more beautiful for young people. And are in constant dialogue with young Achterhoekers. In this way, decisions are not only made for, but also by young people in the Achterhoek!"

"EUREGIO is actively committed to involving young people in its work. To this purpose, the EUREGIO Youth platform has been set up! A network for young people who want to actively participate in cross-border cooperation and thus represent the voices of the young generation in the border region. Young people from Germany and the Netherlands aged 16 to 25 can help shape a "borderless" region through various activities."
